articles.title: EU sets 2027 target for anti-drone system to defend against Russia - BBC
articles.description: It is part of a new drive for the 27-member European Union to be ready for conflict by 2030.
articles.content: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas has said a new anti-drone system should be "fully operational by the end of 2027", as part of a drive to toughen defences against Russia and be fully prepared for … [+3713 chars]
